headline: Anthony Scaramucci Says A Tesla–xAI Merger 'Feels Inevitable' As Shareholders Push For Investment In Grok Parent
summary: On Sunday, Anthony Scaramucci fueled speculation about a potential Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA)–xAI merger. The SkyBridge Capital founder said on X that it "feels inevitable" as Elon Musk ramps up efforts to integrate artificial intelligence into his ...
